title: How do I play TFT?
body: It says the TFT beta pass will be back soon. How do I get a beta pass to play? I see streamers playing it all the time. What do I have to do?

replies.body: Oh I see. Had it on vs AI so I didn't see it. And it was greyed out so I thought I needed a beta code. I see it now that I clicked on the pvp tab. Thank you!
Beta pass just gives rewards, it will be back during Wednesdays patch.   You can press play and go to TFT for right now and do that to play it.
